item.description:
Does the word "Apocalypse" make you cringe? If you knew it meant "the end of darkness and the birth of light," you might welcome it in… This is a sacred time to be alive! The New Age is upon us and it is one of vision & enlightenment. What will be your contribution? Join Mother Clare Watts, Christian Master Teacher & Visionary, for an event that will inspire and teach us how to prepare, what to expect, and how to be a dynamic contributor to this amazing time on earth.

Mother Clare has quite an interesting history. Raised in Switzerland by Baptist missionaries, she initially rebelled against Christianity and tried her hand at many different spiritual paths. She lived in a yoga ashram and trained with the Sufis for a number of years before finding the Christian mystical path. In addition, she was a professional certified midwife for 18 years, and practiced psychotherapy in Boston, Massachusetts after obtaining a graduate degree in Counseling Psychology and post-graduate training in Jungian Analysis. Mother Clare is known for her clarity and deep compassion. She is the author of Giving Birth to God: A Woman’s Path to Enlightenment and Mystical Roses of Peace. She lives at the Center of Light in Dolores, Colorado and oversees the Sophia Peace Center. Visit MotherClareWatts.com to learn more about her, watch her videos and purchase her books.

Suggested Donation: $25 • Bring a Friend for Free
item.name: Bringing in the New Age with Mother Clare Watts
